title: mediaObject
description: List of mediaObjects, always images in reality.

@id.description: The unique URI of the image resource, as included in the response of the image upload request. Not required if `id` is given.

id.description: The unique UUID (generated by UiTdatabank) of the image. Can be used instead of `@id`.

contentUrl.description: URL of the media object file.

thumbnailUrl.description: URL to a thumbnail image of the media object file.

description.description: Description of the media object, in the language used in the `language` property of the media object. If omitted, the description that was given when the media object was uploaded will be used.

copyrightHolder.description: Name of the copyright holder of the media object. If omitted, the copyright holder that was given when the media object was uploaded will be used.

inLanguage.description: Locale of text used in the mediaObject or its description. If omitted, the language that was given when the media object was uploaded will be used.
